snippet.title: Transformers Shadows Rising by Sega (Amusement Expo 2018)
snippet.description: http://arcadeheroes.com - Checking out the upcoming sequel to Transformers Human Alliance called Transformers Shadows Rising. The game was about 75% complete from what was shown here, targeting a Fall launch. New ideas added include a new Achievements system and a lever event controller.
